page.title: 07STANTON FETE
page.content: The{Fete}was held outside the village,in the grounds of a large country house.Inside the house were various craft stalls. Outside there were more including plants,craftwork and cake stalls. Near the house there was a big{tent and tables to sit around; inside food was sold,while music was played in the background by the young musicians of{ {St. Mary's Church.} Three girls sold buttonholes.On the grass{country dancers}danced,and some children danced the{maypole}round a decorated pole.At the end of the fete races were held on the lawn and sweets were given as{prizes}.By five o'clock everyone had drifted away at the end of a lovely,typical village gathering.
